name: Roasted Red Pepper Ketchup
description: Using Serbian ajvar as inspiration, roasted red peppers are mixed with ketchup, garlic, and sherry vinegar, along with smoked paprika for that required smoky flavor.
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons finely chopped roasted red peppers
2 teaspoons freshly minced garlic (about 2 medium cloves)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together ketchup, red peppers, garlic, vinegar, and smoked paprika in a small bowl. Puree until smooth using an immersion blender, or transferring to a regular blender. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to two weeks.
